helen.shapes

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • helen.shapes.Circle

  • public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a processing-drawable circle
    Version:
    9.20.17
    Author:
    Helen Wang

      boolean isGrey

      Creates default instance of Circle, set to zero

      Creates new instance of Circle, with x,y at the upper left corner

    • Field Detail

      • isGrey

        public boolean isGrey

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        Creates default instance of Circle, set to zero

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double radius)
        Creates new instance of Circle, with x,y at the upper left corner
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle the circle is inscribed in
        y - Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle the circle is inscribed in
        radius - Radius of the circle
        Postcondition:
        boolean isGrey is set to true, area and perimeter are set by the area/perimeter methods

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Returns:
        prints absolute value of the circumference of the circle

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns:
        prints the positive area of the circle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double x,
                             double y)
        Checks if a point is inside the circle it is called on
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the point
        y - Y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        boolean of whether the point is inside the circle

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the circle and fills it in, called on a Circle object in DrawingSurface
        Parameters:
        marker - PApplet object
        Postcondition:
        circle should be drawn, fill is set to none

      • isLessThan

        public java.lang.String isLessThan(double area,
                                   double perimeter)
        checks the implicit parameter circle has less, equal, or greater area/perimeter and prints out the answer
        Parameters:
        area - the area that is being compared to the circle's area
        perimeter - the perimeter/circumference being compared to the circle's
        Returns:
        String w/ the result

      • translate

        public void translate(double shiftX,
                      double shiftY)
        Moves the circle
        Parameters:
        shiftX - X pixels that the circle will be translated by
        shiftY - Y pixels that the circle will be translated by
        Postcondition:
        fields x, y will be changed

      • changeColour

        public void changeColour(boolean isGrey)
        Will fill the circle in either w random gray shade or with a colour
        Parameters:
        isGrey - boolean of whether or not the shape should be filled in greyscale or with rbg colour
        Postcondition:
        r, g, b will be set to new numbers and boolean isGrey may be changed

      • setColour

        public void setColour(int colour)
        sets the colour of the circle, called in draw
        Parameters:
        colour - int greyscale value
        Precondition:
        draw will only draw w/ this grey colour if isGrey == true
